channel.title: Run error plz help
channel.description:
when i run my server i get this error
[code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "8 002 " at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(NumberFormatException. java:48) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:456) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:497) at ShopHandler.loadShops(ShopHandler.java:86) at ShopHandler.<init>(ShopHandler.java:33) at server.main(server.java:126)
[/code]

item.title: Run error plz help
item.dc:creator: @xjadefighter xjadefighter
item.description:
@xjadefighter wrote:

ya i redid the whole shop and i got ti working but thnx for the help

Read full topic

item.title: Run error plz help
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

[quote=“xjadefighter, post:5, topic:268276”][quote author=silabgarza link=topic=354073.msg2712872#msg2712872 date=1237426488]

//-----ShopID—ShopName----------------------------------------Sell----Buy-----Item----Amount–Item----Amount–Item----Amount–
shop = 44 PvP shop 2 2 8002 100 13643 100 13004 100 13008 100 13009 100

this is what i have where did i mess up?

between the 8002 and 100
u put a space then a tab, U ONLY NEED TABS
[/quote]

i didnt put any spaces and it still says

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "8 002 " at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(NumberFormatException. java:48) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:456) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:497) at ShopHandler.loadShops(ShopHandler.java:86) at ShopHandler.<init>(ShopHandler.java:33) at server.main(server.java:126) when i run it[/quote]

Your suppose to use correct spacing. Normally tab’s work just fine.

Read full topic
